history.proof: intros n ts v s. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L n : nat ts : Terms n v : nat s : Term Unable to unify "codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)" with "codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (codeTerm L codeF s)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

L: Language
codeF: Functions L -> nat
Formula: Set
Formulas: Set
System: Type
Term: Set
Terms: nat -> Set
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v : nat) (s : Term), codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)

Premises:

Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
freeVarTermApply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))), freeVarTerm L (fol.apply L f ts) = freeVarTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts

Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Terms_Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> P0 n

Term_Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> fol.Term L -> P

codeIffCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (a b : fol.Formula L), codeIff (codeFormula L codeF codeR a) (codeFormula L codeF codeR b) = codeFormula L codeF codeR (iffH L a b)

codeImpCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (a b : fol.Formula L), codeImp (codeFormula L codeF codeR a) (codeFormula L codeF codeR b) = codeFormula L codeF codeR (impH L a b)

Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t

Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : fol.Formula L, P a
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t

Qed.```
